Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1993.) 

---

 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
cbv2h.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. y ps ) ) $.
cbv2h.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
cbv2h.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
cbv2h $p |- ( A. x A. y ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ch ) ) $.
